sentences.en: A Chinese speech recognition method based on character - based N - gram model is proposed in this thesis.
sentences.cn: 本文提出了基于字的N -gram 模型(characterbasedN -gram model) 的汉语语音识别方法,推导了模型参数的估值公式,并给出了模型的训练和识别算法.

sentences.en: A dust particle weighs only a thousandth of a gram.
sentences.cn: 一粒尘埃的重量仅有千分之一克.

sentences.en: A few twentieths of a gram can be critical.
sentences.cn: 即使重量仅有1克的二十分之几都可能是关键性的。

sentences.en: A gram stain should be done to identify organisms.

Gram laughed at the judge. That counted against him.

sentences.en: Theanalysis module can process up to one gram of flowing sample per minute.
sentences.cn: 这种分析模块可以在每分钟内处理一克流体的样本。

sentences.en: Then they chose one gram for weighing water in a cubic centimetre.
sentences.cn: 然后他们将一立方厘米的水的重量定为一克。
